caption.p: 6 (a-b) Graphs showing the effect of different concentrations of fractions and isolated compounds on the amount of biofilm formed (optical density-OD) by S. aureus. EHE : EtOAc fraction; PHE: pet-ether fraction; MHE : MeOH fraction; AKL: alkaloidal fraction; HF1A: holonamine; HF1B: holadienine; HF1C: conessine.
